thread.section_title: Attention: Deliveroo are delivering free tubs of Jude’s Ice Cream today from noon – Metro
thread.title: Attention: Deliveroo are delivering free tubs of Jude’s Ice Cream today from noon
thread.title_full: Attention: Deliveroo are delivering free tubs of Jude’s Ice Cream today from noon

author: Miranda Larbi
title: Attention: Deliveroo are delivering free tubs of Jude’s Ice Cream today from noon

persons.name: busaba eathai banana tree cabana hache tommi

text:
(Picture: Getty) This weekend, the clocks went forward and as such, you’ve missed an hour of precious sleep.
It was OK yesterday when you had nothing to do except for daytime drinking in the glorious sun. But today, you’re stuck in a miserable office with nothing but instant coffee to get you through the day. God help us all.
The difference between baking powder, baking soda and sodium bicarbonate But fear not – Deliveroo is at hand to brighten up our Mondays with a little dose of much-needed sugar.
To mark the beginning of British Summer Time, they’re giving away over 3,000 tubes of Jude’s Ice Cream to optimistic Londoners.
All you’ve got to do is head to the on-demand food delivery service’s app or website and click the ‘Free Ice Cream’ header. You’ll then be directed to a number of host restaurants who’ll be adding tubs of Jude’s Brown Butter Pecan ice cream to every order.
Tuesday treat anyone? Pic via @tranvfood #brownbutterpecan #brownbutterpecanheaven #scoopupjudes #icecreamtime #judesicecream #stripehype #stripytubs #instagood #instafood #icecreamofinsta #yesplease #passthescoop #greatbritishicecream #icecream #icecreamlove #icecreamlover #freshingredients #bestofbritish #lovebritish #lovelocal 
A post shared by Jude's Ice Cream (@judesicecream) on Mar 21, 2017 at 10:40am PDT 
‘No one embraces summer quite like Londoners, from overcast BBQs, flip flops on a rainy day and lobster tans galore,’ says Joe Groves at Deliveroo.
‘At Deliveroo we wanted to set summer up for success and make sure Londoners get a chance to embrace the summer months with open arms.’
But you’ll have to be quick – the offer is available from 12pm until stocks run out.
List of participating restaurants Jamie’s Italian Busaba Eathai Banana Tree Cabana Hache Tommi’s Burger Crust Bros Cocotte Motu Yo! Sushi Gourmet Burger Kitchen 
So, that’s lunch sorted.
